dcterms:description: A large-scale, multi-center, multi-scanner clinical trial MRI dataset of relapsing-remitting (RRMS) patients, used to demonstrate the effectiveness of a deep generative model for counterfactual image synthesis and discovery of personalized predictive markers of future disease outcomes.
dcterms:title: RRMS clinical trial MRI dataset
